topic.title: pzmw's blog - a different approach to everyday things

1_1ALXyaQsvvCQ3R5WBrPbe4dXsqnLCLEkB7.body:
It's basically me talking about my life and my "unusual" ideas.

The **[first post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LfW2jrhzPF1pFSy5yQRMaVPvoNhsZMTBE/?Post:1:Roaches)** was me catching a cockroach.

The **[second](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LfW2jrhzPF1pFSy5yQRMaVPvoNhsZMTBE/?Post:2:Sex)** was a manifest about sex.

The **[third](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LfW2jrhzPF1pFSy5yQRMaVPvoNhsZMTBE/?Post:3:Giving+a+fuck)** was about giving a fuck.

The **[forth](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LfW2jrhzPF1pFSy5yQRMaVPvoNhsZMTBE/?Post:4:Anarchism)** was about anarchism.
